results.title: A resolution designating February 6 through 10, 2017, as "National School Counseling Week".
results.short_title: A resolution designating February 6 through 10, 2017, as "National School Counseling Week".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates February 6-February 10, 2017, as National School Counseling Week.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates February 6-February 10, 2017, as National School Counseling Week.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1092)
